alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:53PM EDT until June 25 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lawrence County in south central Indiana... Southwestern Jackson County in south central Indiana... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Bedford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mitchell and Tunnelton around 505 PM EDT. Spring Mill State Park around 510 PM EDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central Indiana. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
